channel.title: Windows 7 Run and Compiler.bat?
channel.description: I've just got a new windows 7, Sorry if im posting in the wrong board,, its just i need help getting a windows 7 run.bat (for a client and server) and a compile.bat can anyone help? my java is at C:\program files (x86)\java not program files. This is very confusing for me, can anyone help?

item.title: Windows 7 Run and Compiler.bat?
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
This is for the compiler, it should work with 32 bit or 64 bit with no problems (I have 64 bit), this could be used for a client or server, the compiler is pretty blank, you can add your own message in when it compiles if you want, as at the moment, after the process is over it says “please continue…”.

@echo off title DeltaScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
This is for run. Of course you planned on using clients this code would not work you would need to change the path to "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe"

Don’t take it from me though this is very basic information, if you want to go more in depth and make it easier you could always set your variables. There should be a Server setup TuT made by The Soul explaining how to do this. Heres the link to go there http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html.

Read full topic
